extendedInfo.description: Want to get all of sports news, scores, analysis, statistic, schedules and betting odds from a lot of sportsbook in one app? 'Line Winner Pro' is for you. All you need is in one app.'Line Winner Pro' is the mobile sport bet utility for Android which provides the real-time sports betting odds or line comparison reports from famous sportsbook in the world to help you make the final decision before you place your sport bet on your bookmaker's website or just predict win or lost. Also, it includes sports news, scores, analysis, statistic and schedules.Features:1. Covers world wide soccer, us football, basketball, baseball, ice hockey, softball, racing, fighting, boxing, golf, tennis and other sports events / matches in the world. All of sports major leagues have been covered.2. Powered by many world-wide famous sportsbook.3. Supports money line, spread line, total line, three way, double chance betting data.4. Provides 1st half, 2nd half, 1st period, 2nd period, 3rd period, 1st Quarter, 2nd Quarter, 3rd Quarter, 4th Quarter betting data.5. Multiple odds format including us format, decimal, fractional, implied probability, hong kong, indonesian, malay.6. Share the best odds via facebook, twitter, sms, email...7. Hot event and hot/best odds.8. Odds history.9. Odds trend chart.10. Support multiple screens including tablet.11. Settings for the favourite sport, league, soccer country, odds format, odds type, odds period and even sportsbook.12. Text search or voice search for events.13. Sports live scores and games results, more event / match stats (lineup, stats, goals, cards and substitutions) and news & event / match tickets will be added soon.14. Team play history.15. Betting calculator.16. Followed events / matches.17. Event and odds statistic.18. Odds type and event period statistic.19. Sports latest news, analysis, schedules & more.20. Text search or voice search for sports news.DISCLAIMER*** Please note this app just provides the real-time sports betting odds or line comparison reports from famous sportsbook in the world to help you make the final decision before you place your sport bet on your bookmaker's website or just predict win or lost in any event. It doesn't provide any real and simulative sports gambling features. We are not encouraging to use it for real online gambling purpose, please know your limit and your risk before you use it.

reviews.title: Not worth
reviews.comment: First of all in order to get some money you should give at least 3 days trial so people see if its worth it. Second of all it force closes a lot, so fix it. And third of all if it doesn\'t come with arguments about picks this app is zero.  So fix all these and then expect people to buy it. Untill then, to other people interested in this kind of apps I recommend Bet2Win. I bought them all and they\'re worth every cent!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Having ALL sports(futbol, baseball, cricket, AFL, tennis, handball to list a few) and multiple lines in one place plus news and links. Genius!!

reviews.title: Very limited if you don\'t pay a fee
reviews.comment: Not shoeing scores, only the betting odds. Very limited if you don\'t pay a fee.
